tool_description: an APi showing all the latest news of the moment and category selector
name: Current News
title: Current News

api_list.name: Get Individual category news
api_list.description: The category you want to get headlines for. Possible options: business, entertainment, general, health, science, sports, technology
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://current-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/technology"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "current-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://current-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{category}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "current-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All News Current
api_list.description: This endpoint provides live top and breaking headlines for specific category: general and multiple sources.
